title: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
description: Build AI systems that access external knowledge. Learn how to overcome knowledge cutoffs and hallucinations by grounding AI in your own data.
description_cs: Budujte AI systémy s přístupem k externím znalostem. Naučte se překonat knowledge cutoff a halucinace ukotvením AI ve vašich vlastních datech.
learning_objectives: Understand why RAG solves knowledge cutoff and hallucination problems
Learn the RAG pipeline: Index → Retrieve → Generate
Master embedding models and vector similarity search
Compare vector databases: Pinecone, Chroma, Weaviate, Qdrant
Implement effective chunking strategies for documents
Build a working RAG system with practical labs
